resources.string: Keeping track of how you feel will give you a better understanding of things that influence your mood.
Keeping track of how you feel will give you a better understanding of things that influence your mood. You can also see the effects your treatment has on you.

Several times during the day, Goalie will ask you to indicate your emotional state. Your goal is to try to enter your emotional state at least three times a day. Every time you do so will earn you 7 points. Each day is divided in four periods of six hours each, and you can earn points once every period.
Please log how you are feeling right now
